resources:
Grandma Gear
This Product is NOT a substitute for medically prescribed patient care! For best results, wearers should have a loved one or care taker download this app and follow their account. Also note that erroneous Heart Rate values and Fall Detections are rare but possible. Please consult the owner manual for more information. Accept Decline
WARNING! Are you sure you want to delete this wearer account from your list? This action is NOT reversible. Are you sure you want to delete this notification from your list? This action is NOT reversible. Confirm
Please ensure that your Grandma Gear Device is sync with your phone before creating your account. The device can be synced from your phone\'s Bluetooth menu in the phone Settings. Device password as well as step by step instructions for syncing your device can be found in the device owner\'s manual. Continue

//Location Map Key AIzaSyDVOVaUL4jt-s1wTos1jdQNNWfL28_ffJo Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Google Maps API Demos\'. Location permission is required for this demo.
